api_endpoints.description: Returns agency overview information for USAspending.gov's Agency Details page for agencies that have ever awarded
Returns agency summary information, specifically the number of transactions and award obligations for the sub agency section of USAspending.gov's Agency Details page
Returns a count of New Awards for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns a count of Awards types for agencies in a single fiscal year
Returns a list of Budget Functions and Budget Subfunctions for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns the count of Budget Functions for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns budgetary resources and obligations for the agency and fiscal year requested
Returns a list of Federal Accounts and Treasury Accounts for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns the count of Federal Accounts and Treasury Accounts for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns a list of Object Classes for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns the count of Object Classes for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns a breakdown of obligations by award category within a single fiscal year
Returns a list of Program Activity categories for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns the count of Program Activity categories for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns a list of sub-agencies and offices with obligated amounts, transaction counts and new award counts for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns the number of sub-agencies and offices for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns a list of federal_accounts by bureau for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns a list of bureaus for the agency in a single fiscal year
Returns a list of Object Classes for the specified Treasury Account Symbol (tas).
Returns a list of Program Activities for the specified Treasury Account Symbol (tas).
Returns Treasury Account Symbol Availability Type Code (A) filtered by other components provided in the request filter

Returns Treasury Account Symbol Sub-Account Code (SUB) filtered by other components provided in the request filter
Returns awarding agencies matching the specified search text
Returns awarding agencies and office matching the specified search text
Returns funding agencies and office matching the specified search text
Returns CFDA programs matching the specified search text
Returns city names matching the search text, sorted by relevance
Returns recipient names and uei based on search text
Returns funding agencies matching the specified search text
Returns glossary terms matching provided search text
Returns NAICS objects matching the specified search text
Returns product or service (PSC) codes and their descriptions based on a search string. This may be the 4-character PSC code or a description string.
Returns program activities and their names based on a search string. This may be the 4-character program activity code or a name string.
Returns locations based on search text
Returns all award spending by recipient for a given fiscal year and agency id
Returns details about specific award
Returns a list of federal accounts for the indicated award
Returns the number of federal accounts associated with the award
Returns the number of subawards associated with the award
Returns the number of subawards associated with the award
Returns the number of transactions associated with the award
Returns federal account, awarding agencies, funding agencies, and transaction obligated amount information for a requested award
Returns aggregated count of awarding agencies, federal accounts, and total transaction obligated amount for an award
Returns date of last update
Returns all Budget Functions associated with a TAS, ordered by Budget Function code
Returns all Budget Functions associated with a TAS, ordered by Budget Function code
Generates zip file for download of award data in CSV format
Lists all the agencies and the subagencies or federal accounts associated under specific agencies
Lists the monthly files associated with the requested params
Returns the current status of a download job that that has been requested with thev2/bulk_download/awards/orv2/bulk_download/transaction/endpoint that same day.
Returns the count of Agencies which received disaster/emergency funding
Returns insights on the Agencies awarding loans from disaster/emergency funding

Returns a federal account based on its federal account code

Returns budget information for a federal account for the year provided based on account's internal ID
Returns budget information for a federal account for the most recent year based on account's internal ID
Returns financial spending data by object class
Returns a paginated list of obligations for the provided agency for the provided year
